verses.verse: בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son חָ֭כָם <WH2450> A wise מ֣וּסַר <WH4148> instruction אָ֑ב <WH1> [heareth] his father's וְ֝לֵ֗ץ <WH3887> but a scorner לֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heareth גְּעָרָֽה׃ <WH1606> not rebuke

מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> by the fruit פִי־ <WH6310> of [his] mouth אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> A man יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> shall eat ט֑וֹב <WH2896> good וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> but the soul בֹּגְדִ֣ים <WH898> of the transgressors חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> [shall eat] violence

נֹצֵ֣ר <WH5341> He that keepeth פִּ֭יו <WH6310> his mouth שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> keepeth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his life פֹּשֵׂ֥ק <WH6589> [but] he that openeth wide שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> his lips מְחִתָּה־ <WH4288> shall have destruction לֽוֹ׃

מִתְאַוָּ֣ה <WH183> desireth וָ֭אַיִן <WH369> and nothing נַפְשׁ֣וֹ <WH5315> The soul עָצֵ֑ל <WH6102> of the sluggard וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> and [hath] nothing but the soul חָרֻצִ֣ים <WH2742> of the diligent תְּדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <WH1878> shall be made fat

דְּבַר־ <WH1697> act שֶׁ֭קֶר <WH8267> falsehood יִשְׂנָ֣א <WH8130> [man] hateth צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> A righteous וְ֝רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> but a wicked יַבְאִ֥ישׁ <WH887> [man] is loathsome וְיַחְפִּֽיר׃ <WH2659> and cometh to shame

צְ֭דָקָה <WH6666> Righteousness תִּצֹּ֣ר <WH5341> keepeth תָּם־ <WH8537> [him that is] upright דָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way וְ֝רִשְׁעָ֗ה <WH7564> but wickedness תְּסַלֵּ֥ף <WH5557> overthroweth חַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> the sinner

יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is מִ֭תְעַשֵּׁר <WH6238> that maketh himself rich וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> has כֹּ֑ל <WH3605> yet מִ֝תְרוֹשֵׁ֗שׁ <WH7326> yet [hath] nothing [there is] that maketh himself poor וְה֣וֹן <WH1952> riches רָֽב׃ <WH7227> [hath] great

כֹּ֣פֶר <WH3724> The ransom נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> life אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of a man's עָשְׁר֑וֹ <WH6239> [are] his riches וְ֝רָ֗שׁ <WH7326> but the poor לֹא־ <WH3808> no שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heareth גְּעָרָֽה׃ <WH1606> not rebuke
אוֹר־ <WH216> The light צַדִּיקִ֥ים <WH6662> of the righteous יִשְׂמָ֑ח <WH8055> rejoiceth וְנֵ֖ר <WH5216> but the lamp רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <WH1846> shall be put out

רַק־ <WH7535> but בְּ֭זָדוֹן <WH2087> Only by pride יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> cometh מַצָּ֑ה <WH4683> contention וְאֶת־ <WH854> for נ֖וֹעָצִ֣ים <WH3289> but with the well advised חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> [is] wisdom

ה֭וֹן <WH1952> Wealth מֵהֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> [gotten] by vanity יִמְעָ֑ט <WH4591> shall be diminished וְקֹבֵ֖ץ <WH6908> but he that gathereth עַל־ <WH5921> by יָ֣ד <WH3027> by labour יַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH7235> shall increase

תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת <WH8431> Hope מְ֭מֻשָּׁכָה <WH4900> deferred מַחֲלָה־ <WH2470> sick לֵ֑ב <WH3820> maketh the heart וְעֵ֥ץ <WH6086> [it is] a tree חַ֝יִּ֗ים <WH2416> of life תַּאֲוָ֥ה <WH8378> but [when] the desire בָאָֽה׃ <WH935> cometh

בָּ֣ז <WH936> Whoso despiseth לְ֭דָבָר <WH1697> the word יֵחָ֣בֶל <WH2254> shall be destroyed ל֑וֹ וִירֵ֥א <WH3373> but he that feareth מִ֝צְוָ֗ה <WH4687> the commandment ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <WH7999> shall be rewarded

תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> The law חָ֭כָם <WH2450> of the wise מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> [is] a fountain חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life לָ֝ס֗וּר <WH5493> to depart מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי <WH4170> from the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death
שֵֽׂכֶל־ <WH7922> understanding ט֭וֹב <WH2896> Good יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> giveth חֵ֑ן <WH2580> favour וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> but the way בֹּגְדִ֣ים <WH898> of transgressors אֵיתָֽן׃ <WH386> [is] hard

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every עָ֭רוּם <WH6175> Every prudent יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> [man] dealeth בְדָ֑עַת <WH1847> with knowledge וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <WH3684> but a fool יִפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> layeth open אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> [his] folly

מַלְאָ֣ךְ <WH4397> messenger רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> A wicked יִפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> falleth בְּרָ֑ע <WH7451> into mischief וְצִ֖יר <WH6735> ambassador אֱמוּנִ֣ים <WH529> but a faithful מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> [is] health

רֵ֣ישׁ <WH7389> Poverty וְ֭קָלוֹן <WH7036> and shame פּוֹרֵ֣עַ <WH6544> [shall be to] him that refuseth מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> instruction וְשׁוֹמֵ֖ר <WH8104> but he that regardeth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> reproof יְכֻבָּֽד׃ <WH3513> shall be honoured

תַּאֲוָ֣ה <WH8378> The desire נִ֭הְיָה <WH1961> accomplished תֶּעֱרַ֣ב <WH6149> is sweet לְנָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> to the soul וְתוֹעֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> but [it is] abomination כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים <WH3684> to fools ס֣וּר <WH5493> to depart מֵרָֽע׃ <WH7451> from evil

[הָלֹוךְ כ] (הֹולֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> along ק) אֶת־ <WH854> with חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> with wise [וַחֲכָם כ] (יֶחְכָּ֑ם <WH2449> exceeding ק) וְרֹעֶ֖ה <WH7462> but a companion כְסִילִ֣ים <WH3684> of fools יֵרֽוֹעַ׃ <WH7321> shall be destroyed
חַ֭טָּאִים <WH2400> sinners תְּרַדֵּ֣ף <WH7291> pursueth רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> Evil וְאֶת־ <WH853> צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> but to the righteous יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> shall be repayed טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good

ט֗וֹב <WH2896> A good יַנְחִ֥יל <WH5157> [man] leaveth an inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> to his children's בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> children וְצָפ֥וּן <WH6845> [is] laid up לַ֝צַּדִּ֗יק <WH6662> for the just חֵ֣יל <WH2428> and the wealth חוֹטֵֽא׃ <WH2398> of the sinner

רָב־ <WH7230> Much אֹ֭כֶל <WH400> food נִ֣יר <WH5215> [is in] the tillage רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7326> of the poor וְיֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> but there is נִ֝סְפֶּ֗ה <WH5595> [that is] destroyed בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> for want מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> of judgment

חוֹשֵׂ֣ךְ <WH2820> He that spareth שִׁ֭בְטוֹ <WH7626> his rod שׂוֹנֵ֣א <WH8130> hateth בְנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וְ֝אֹהֲב֗וֹ <WH157> but he that loveth שִֽׁחֲר֥וֹ <WH7836> him betimes מוּסָֽר׃ <WH4148> him chasteneth

צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> The righteous אֹ֭כֵל <WH398> eateth לְשֹׂ֣בַע <WH7648> to the satisfying נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> of his soul וּבֶ֖טֶן <WH990> but the belly רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked תֶּחְסָֽר׃ <WH2637> shall want פ
